LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAA.label: Anti-Air autocannon
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAA.description: A manned autocannon that launches solid metal bullets. Useful for attacking aerial targets or groups of enemies in the field.
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAA.verbs.Verb_ShootCE.label: Anti-Air autocannon
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAT.label: Anti-Tank cannon
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAT.description: A manned cannon that fires solid metal shells. It's accuracy and armor penetration make it ideal against heavily armored targets.
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAT.verbs.Verb_ShootCE.label: Anti Tank Cannon
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAT_Plus.label: 76mm anti-tank gun
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretAT_Plus.description: A direct-fire cannon with capability to destroy a heavy armed vehicle.
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretQuadAA.label: Quad Anti Air cannon
LanguageData.FT_Gun_TurretQuadAA.description: An Quad mounted Autocannon designed to defend the area of skies, but also a nice weapon for ground targets.
LanguageData.FT_TurretAA.label: Anti-Air gun
LanguageData.FT_TurretAA.description: A manned autocannon that launches solid metal bullets. Useful for attacking aerial targets or groups of enemies in the field.
LanguageData.FT_TurretAT.label: Anti-Tank gun
LanguageData.FT_TurretAT.description: A manned cannon that fires solid metal shells. It's accuracy and armor penetration makes it ideal against heavily armored targets.
LanguageData.FT_TurretAT_Plus.label: 76mm anti-tank gun
LanguageData.FT_TurretAT_Plus.description: A direct-fire cannon with capability to destroy a heavy armed vehicle.
LanguageData.FT_TurretQuadAA.label: Quad Anti Air Gun
LanguageData.FT_TurretQuadAA.description: A manned autocannon that launches solid metal bullets.It is rapid fired makes it useful for attacking aerial target or enemies in the field.
